question:
Which of the following vaccines have been included as part of Universal Immunization Programme (UIP)?
  1. Inactivated Polio Vaccine (IPV)
  2. Rotavirus vaccine
  3. Measles Rubella (MR) vaccine
  4. Adult Japanese Encephalitis (JE) vaccine
 Select the correct option from codes given below:
explanation: All of the above given vaccines are included as part of Universal Immunization Programme (UIP). Recently, four new vaccines have being introduced as part of UIP including Inactivated Polio Vaccine (IPV), Rotavirus vaccine, Measles, Rubella (MR) vaccine, and Adult Japanese Encephalitis (JE) vaccine. With these new vaccines, India’s UIP will provide free vaccines against 12 life threatening diseases.
